name: unifi can connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent fails to connect to the Unifi Console, otherwise `OK`.

name: unifi healthy
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Unifi Console is not up, otherwise `OK`.

name: unifi device status
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the device is not in state 1, otherwise `OK`.

name: unifi device uplink
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the device uplink is not up, otherwise `OK`.
